verbs.description: bestud (third-person singular simple present bestuds, present participle bestudding, simple past and past participle bestudded)

entries.meaning: (transitive) To set with or as with studs; adorn with bosses.
examples: His turban, or mandil [mandīl], was of finest white silk interwoven with gold, bestudded with pearl[s] and carbuncles;  […]
